title: New: EXES – Like You
body:
**EXES’s** Twentythousand released earlier this year became somewhat of a semi-viral hit, clocking up close to a million streams across various platforms and a whole host of online support.

The follow-up, _Like You_, comes across like a sugary sweet yet savage rebuttal of a former lover, sticking the knife in whilst also reminiscing back to simpler times, all wrapped up in some shiny pop production. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
